channel.description: Recent content in Serverless on schadokar.dev

item.title: Create a Serverless Application in Golang With AWS
item.description: In this tutorial, we are going to create a golang serverless application and deploy it to the AWS cloud.

item.title: Create your first Serverless application
item.description: Serverless computing is a cloud computing execution model in which the cloud provider runs the server, and dynamically manages the allocation of machine resources.
